articles.title: How E-40 fuels the Golden State Warriors. And vice versa.
articles.description: E-40, the Bay Area rap legend, has been a Warriors since birth. To understand what it means to love a dynasty in peril, you need to see the Dubs through the eyes of their No. 1 fan.

articles.title: Celtics without Porzingis (quad) against Warriors
articles.description: Kristaps Porzingis will miss the Celtics' Sunday showdown against the visiting Warriors due to a left quad contusion.
articles.content:
Boston Celtics power forward/center Kristaps Porzingis has been ruled out of Sunday's game against the visiting Golden State Warriors due to a left quad contusion.

articles.title: Curry beats Ionescu by 3 in All-Star shootout
articles.description: Stephen Curry edged past WNBA star Sabrina Ionescu 29-26 in the first ever him-vs.-her shootout at the NBA's All-Star weekend.
articles.content:
Feb 17, 2024, 10:23 PM ET
INDIANAPOLIS -- Stephen Curry was on a roll -- and it was barely enough to beat Sabrina Ionescu.
And fittingly, he won by three.
